title: Application of neutrophil-to-lymphocyte-to-monocyte ratio in predicting mortality risk in adult patients with septic shock: A retrospective cohort study conducted at a single center
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Xiao-ming Lin, Lian-fang Zhang, Yu-ting Wang, Ting Huang, Xue-feng Lin, Xiang-yu Hong, Hong-jun Zheng, Rong-cheng Xie, Jie-fei Ma
